tool_description: Detects and reports scheduling conflicts including overlapping appointments, resource double-booking, and constraint violations in technician schedules.

check_travel_time.description: Whether to check for insufficient travel time between jobs

minimum_buffer.description: Minimum buffer time between jobs in minutes

error_messages: Invalid schedule format: Schedule entries must follow 'technician_id:job_id:start_time:end_time:location' format
Invalid time format: Use ISO 8601 date-time format
Negative buffer time: minimum_buffer must be non-negative
Empty schedule data: At least one schedule entry must be provided
usage: Provide schedule data to identify conflicts such as overlapping appointments, insufficient travel time, and resource conflicts.

affected_technicians.description: IDs of technicians with schedule conflicts
